Class ArenaMapDataFile

java.lang.Object
com.conquest.configurationHandler.ConfigurationFiles.ArenaFiles.ArenaMapDataFile
public class ArenaMapDataFile extends Object
ðŸ’¾ ArenaMapDataFile Handles async saving and loading of arena map snapshots (regeneration). Optimized for PaperMC 1.21.4 and fully thread-safe.
